description:
ok so this is exactly how you condition the next generation to give up their freedoms . You train the children that everyone but the government is out to hurt you ,  other people are bad , distance from everyone , listen to your government , its for your safety . The damage that is being done to children becuase of this ""virus"" will have massive Repercussions.  they don't care about the adults who go against the narrative as long as enough of them teach their children to follow orders. 
think about it kids at school will start to bully others who don't wear masks , masks will become a fashion statement.  call in Gucci and Prada,  where did you get your sanitation wipe holder? "" oh its dolce and Gabbana "" . ""look at the idiot holding hands with his girlfriend"" . 
they are trying to create a real 1984 through generational mind control . we must not allow them to. .
.
.
